Title: Following Chairman Mao forever more making revolution, following Chairman Mao making the whole world red ...
Designer: Chongqing Municipality Revolutionary Committee 29 (重庆市二十九中革命委員会)
Publisher: Sichuan renmin chubanshe (四川人民出版社)
Notes: The full title: Following Chairman Mao forever more making revolution, following Chairman Mao making the whole world red; most warmly hail to the victorious convention of the great, glorious and right 9th national representative assembly of the Communist Party of China! The 9th National Congress of the CCP was held in the Great Hall of the People, Beijing, between 1-24 April 1969.
